mention.text: his State of the Union address

a priority of his administration in welfare reform final three years He instructed his charges to draw up plans for '' immediate action '' that would enable poor families to achieve '' real and lasting emancipation '' from welfare dependency '' The success of welfare , '' he said , '' should be judged by how many of The success of welfare recipients become independent of welfare

welfare reform final three years He instructed his charges to draw up plans for '' immediate action '' that would enable poor families to achieve '' real and lasting emancipation '' from welfare dependency '' The success of welfare , '' he said , '' should be judged by how many of The success of welfare recipients become independent of welfare
